items.sentence: Tom didn\'t have enough experience to know what to do.
Tom didn\'t know where Mary spent her summer vacation.
Tom didn\'t know who Mary was going to get married to.
I\'m going to allow Tom to do whatever he wants to do.
I\'m going to try to be much more careful from now on.
I\'m just grateful none of my friends saw me with Tom.
I\'m just saying there must be another way to do this.
Unless whales are protected, they will become extinct.
We are influenced both by environment and by heredity.
We celebrated our tenth wedding anniversary yesterday.
We conduct safety inspections here on a regular basis.
We enjoyed seeing the city, but we got a little tired.
It\'s been three years since Tom and Mary got married.
It\'s been three years since Tom has been to visit us.
It\'s doubtful that anything will get done here today.
Tom is taller than any of the other kids in his class.
Tom knew Mary would probably be studying for the exam.
Tom might just have been repeating what Mary told him.
Tom never had the chance to talk to Mary at the party.
Tom has asked Mary to meet him at his office tomorrow.
